S02sjdh_u:2_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmiṃ samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma,
S02sjdh_u:2_1_0: gṛdhrakūṭe mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ dvādaśabhir bhikṣuśatair evaṃ pramukhaiś cānekamahāśrāvakādibodhisattvabhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsikopāsikādevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyarājāmātyapaurajānapadaparivāraiḥ /
S02sjdh_u:3_0_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavāṃś catasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ arcanādisaṃskṛtas tadā bodhisattvaviṣayasandarśanapraṇidhānavyūhasamādhiviṣayadhāraṇīsukhavyūhasamādhānanirdeśacaryāvaiśāradyamahāvaipulyabodhisattvānugatasarvabuddhaparigraha
S02sjdh_u:3_1: tadā nānāvarṇaraśmayo niścaritāyan prabhābhirayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātun mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt /
S02sjdh_u:4_1_0: atha ratnavairocano nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahānimittaṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasā sthāyaikāṃśam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā
S02sjdh_u:4_1_1: dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat /
S02sjdh_u:4_2: paramāścaryābhūt tatprāpto 'haṃ bhagavan kuta ime raśmaya āgatāḥ? kasyaiṣa viṣayaprabhāvaḥ? ko 'tra hetupratyayo bhaviṣyati?
S02sjdh_u:5_0: bhagavān āha / asti kulaputra pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi,
S02sjdh_u:5_1: ito buddhakṣetrakoṭīśatasahasragaṅgānadīvālukāsamān buddhakṣetrān atikramya padmā nāma lokadhātu nānāguṇaratnavibhūṣitā nānāratnakūṭāgārādivṛkṣapuṣpakariṇyupaśobhitā /
S02sjdh_u:5_2: yatraikajātipratibaddhā bodhisattvāḥ padmottaratathāgataḥ sakāśad dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti /
S02sjdh_u:5_3: tatra lokadhātau indro nāma mahābodhivṛkṣaratnamayāny asti /
S02sjdh_u:5_6: tatra padmāsananiṣaṇṇā bodhisattvāḥ tasya prātihāryāṇi paśyanti /
S02sjdh_u:5_7: te sarvalokadhātubhyaḥ āgatā bodhisattvās tāṃ pūjayitvā tatra sthitāḥ /
S02sjdh_u:6_1_0: atha padmottaratathāgatas teṣāṃ āśayānuśayaṃ jñātvā bahujanahitāya sukhāya lokānukampāya devamanuṣyāṇāñ ca hitāya mahāyānasya
S02sjdh_u:6_2: bodhisattva āha / bhagavan kiyac ciraṃ sā lokadhātuḥ padmottaras tathāgatas tiṣṭhati saddharmaṃ vā /
S02sjdh_u:6_3: bhagavān āha / bhaviṣyati kulaputra padmottarasya tathāgatasyāyuṣpramāṇaṃ triṃśadantarakalpāni,
S02sjdh_u:6_5: ye yatra jātā bodhisattvās teṣāṃ catvāriṃśadantarakalpāyuṣpramāṇaṃ /
S02sjdh_u:6_6: pūrvañ ca kulaputra sā lokadhātuś candanā nāma babhūva /
S02sjdh_u:6_7: na tv evaṃ pariśuddhā nākīrṇaśuddhasattvā yathaitarhi sā lokadhātuḥ /
S02sjdh_u:6_8: kulaputra candanāyāṃ lokadhātau candrottamo nāmābhūt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvat sa cāpi viṃśatyantarakalpān dharmaṃ deśayitavān /
S02sjdh_u:6_9: tasya parinirvāṇakālasamaye cāpy ekatyā bodhisattvāḥ praṇidhānavaśenānyadbuddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāntāḥ /
S02sjdh_u:6_11: adyarātrau madhyame yāme candrottamas tathāgataḥ parinirvāsyati tasya daśāntarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /
S02sjdh_u:7_1: tena khalu punaḥ samayena gaganamudro nāma bodhisattvaḥ sa pūrvapraṇidhānena candrottamena tathāgatena vyākṛtaḥ /
S02sjdh_u:7_2: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputra mama parinirvṛtasya daśāntarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati;
S02sjdh_u:7_4: tatraiva rātryāḥ paścime yāme tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase,
S02sjdh_u:7_6: tatkāle ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yena candrottamas tathāgatas tenopajagmuḥ /
S02sjdh_u:7_7: upetya te sarve nānāprakārair bodhisattvavikurvaiś candrottamasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam etad avocan /
S02sjdh_u:7_8: icchāmo vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavann ime daśāntarakalpā nirodham avahitena cittenātināmayituṃ /
S02sjdh_u:8_0: tatra khalu kulaputra candrottamas tathāgato gaganamudraṃ bodhisattvam āmantryaitad avocat /
S02sjdh_u:8_1: udgṛhṇa tvaṃ kulaputremaṃ sarvajñātākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ sarvātītānāgatais tathāgataiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair yauvarājyābhiṣiktānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ deśitaṃ /
S02sjdh_u:8_2: ye caitarhi daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhantas te 'pi deśayanti /
S02sjdh_u:8_3: ye bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani buddhā bhagavantas te 'pi yauvarājyābhiṣiktabodhisattvānāṃ deśayiṣyanti /
S02sjdh_u:9_1: jalijalini mahājalini phutke butke saṃmade mahāsaṃmade,
S02sjdh_u:9_2: devām aṭi caṭi ṭake ṭharaṭharkke amimakasi hili cili tili ruruke mahāruruke,
S02sjdh_u:9_3: jaya durjaye jaye jayamati śānte śāntanirghoṣaṇi,
S02sjdh_u:9_4: amūlaparichinne, mārasainya vitrāsane, mukte muktapariśuddhe, abhite bhayamocane, bhāra charaṇā dānta vidyāvidyā varuttame,
S02sjdh_u:9_5: nigrahaṃ parivādināṃ, dharmavādinām anugrahaṃ, ārakṣa dharmavādināṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānām adhimuktipadaprakāśanapadam idaṃ /
S02sjdh_u:11_0: bhāṣithe bhāṣaṇe, dhāre dhārayati, gupte śubhaprabhe tatphale agraphale niṣphale nilaha amukta amukta nirmukte,
S02sjdh_u:11_1_0: atravita vimuktavati, vilaphala, ayukta iviti, yiviti ratitula, tulamaṃ ahiṃsāma itivāva, atvānatvāna sarvaloke, aneka livindha
S02sjdh_u:11_1_1: abhūsare, hatamatte, veśāgravate, aphala, kaphala, trayāṇām ārakṣitānāṃ adhimuktipadam idaṃ /
S02sjdh_u:12_2: niyāmaphalaṃ, samudānāya vibhūṣa, pasye somantra, anumatto akumatto, chedāvane mantrastā daśabala vigrahasthā,
S02sjdh_u:12_3: isusthita, sunikhama, tīkṣṇāmati, āloko, atitṛṣṇā, adimati, pratyutpannabuddhapūrvaprahāre,
S02sjdh_u:13_0_0: anye manye mane, mamane, vire virate, śame śamitāvi, śānte mukte nirakṣame, same samasame, kṣaye akṣaye, ajiti śānte samiṣṭhe,
S02sjdh_u:13_0_1: dhāraṇī ālokāvabhāse, ratnavrate, rasamyavate, jñānavate, meruvate, kṣayanidarśane, lokapradīpanidarśane, caturṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām
S02sjdh_u:14_2: sarvasava vamāṃ, sarve prāthavā kṣayaṃ kare, gokāha vadane, lokānudarśanavibhū, caturṇāṃ ṛddhipādānām adhimuktipadaprakāśapadam idaṃ /
S02sjdh_u:15_0: acale buddhe vṛddhapracale, satva gṛhṇa siddhi, kaṃpati nisiddha smahiṭṭe parekasire,
S02sjdh_u:15_1: some cande datve acala acala apare vicivale nipale pracacale [Page 12] prasare,
S02sjdh_u:15_2: anaya abhyāse, kaṃkame prabhāvini, drāme nijaso grakkrame nayane indriyāṇāṃ balānām adhimuktipadaprakāśapadam idaṃ /
S02sjdh_u:16_0_0: puṣpe supuṣpe, drumaparihāre, abhayarucire, cekaratke, akṣayam astu, ninire mamale, pañcaśiśire, lokasya vijñāne, nayasaṃgṛhīte
S02sjdh_u:16_0_1: ca yukte succhendena saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ adhimuktipadaprakāśapadam idaṃ /
S02sjdh_u:17_0_0: cakravajre, maitra samāpade, krānte kete, karuṇa rudīkṣayi, prītirūpe kṣamasaṃpanne, arake varate, kharo khare, amūle mūle,
S02sjdh_u:18_0: vartte cakre cakradhare varacakre vare pravare,
S02sjdh_u:18_1: hile hire dhare, ārūpāvate, huhure yathā jibhaṃga niṃvare,
S02sjdh_u:18_3: satyanirhāre, jaravila, viryanihāra, cūre mārganihāra samādhinihāra prajñānihāra vimuktinirhāra,
S02sjdh_u:18_7: tatrabuddhaṃ nihaṃgamapare, araha daraha paṇḍale [Page 13] paṇḍale tatrārtalu,
S02sjdh_u:18_9: gatapraṃgamanu niruva, nāśani nāśabandhani, cchicchini, cchicchidrama, yova hiḍiṃgamā vare mare, hanane, bhare bhare bhunde bhire bhire ruṣare,
S02sjdh_u:18_10_0: saraṇe, daraṇe, pravartte, calanāḍaye, vidraṃvumā varakhumā, brahmacāriṇa, indravani, dhidhirāyani, maheśvaralalani, mamasume,
S02sjdh_u:18_10_1: aramini ekākṣara vivañcani, carasti ābhicandāra sūre, sarvasūrā āvarasūrā, punakanitāṃ, maṇḍitāṃ āyinakaṇḍi jabhāme, gandhare,
S02sjdh_u:18_10_2: atra runimakare, bhirohini siddhamatte, vilokamate, buddhādhiṣṭhite, dhāraṇīmukhe, daśānāṃ balānām adhimuktiprakāśanapadam
S02sjdh_u:19_0: samanantarārabdhe khalu punar bhagavatāsmiṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśe 'yaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakaṃpitā;
S02sjdh_u:19_1: tathāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu sarve lokadhātavaḥ samapāṇītalajātā sphuṭā saṃdṛśyante /
S02sjdh_u:19_2_0: ye 'pi teṣv avasthitāḥ samādhidhāraṇīkṣāntipratilabdhā bodhisattvās tathāgatabalena svakasvakeṣu [Page 14] buddhakṣetreṣv
S02sjdh_u:19_2_1: antarhitā imāṃ sahālokadhātum āgatvā gṛdhrakūṭe bhagavataḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntās tasya pādau śirasā vanditvā nānāprakāraiḥ
S02sjdh_u:19_3: gaṇanāsamatikrāntāś ca devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍamanuṣyakumbhāṇḍapiśācādayas sannipatitās te tatra padmābuddhakṣetraṃ mahatā bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaṃ tathāgataṃ ca paśyanti /
S02sjdh_u:19_4_0: samanantarodāhṛtasyeyaṃ dhāraṇīmukhapraveśasya bhagavatā dvāsaptatibhir gaṅgānadīvālukāsamair bodhisattvair iyaṃ dhāraṇī
S02sjdh_u:19_4_1: pratilabdhā daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātusthāṃ buddhān bhagavataś ca guṇavyūhān paśyanti sma /
S02sjdh_u:19_5: te āścaryaprāptā buddhapūjāṃ kṛtvā samādhibalena tasthuḥ /
S02sjdh_u:20_0: bhagavān āha / imāṃ kulaputra dhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ bodhisattvo bhāvayamānaś caturaśītidhāraṇīśatasahasrāṇi dvāsaptatiś ca ṣaṣṭiñ ca sahasrāṇi pratilabhate mahāmaitrīkaruṇādayaḥ /
S02sjdh_u:20_1: ye ca māṃ dhāraṇīṃ śroṣyanti te 'vaivartino bhaviṣyanti /
S02sjdh_u:20_2: ye likhiṣyanti te buddhadarśanena saddharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānenāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti /
S02sjdh_u:20_4: [Page 15] ye svādhyāyanti teṣāṃ sarvāṇy akarmāni parikṣayaṃ gacchati /
S02sjdh_u:20_5: ye bhāvayanti teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇy akarmāni naśyuḥ /
S02sjdh_u:20_8: ye parebhyaś ca vistareṇa bhāṣayanti te tathāgatā bhavanti /
S02sjdh_u:21_0: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat /
S02sjdh_u:21_1: yaiḥ khalu kulaputrātītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair asyā dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāvena samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prāptāmaḥ /
S02sjdh_u:21_2: mayā bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśād imān dhāraṇīṃ prāptā,
S02sjdh_u:21_4: etarhy api mayā dhāritā vācitā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśitā /
S02sjdh_u:21_5: evaṃ khalu maitreya yathā gaganamudrabodhisattvena candrottamatathāgatasya sakāśād imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ prāptā dhāritā vācitā,
S02sjdh_u:21_6_0: 'syā dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāvena gaganamudro bodhisattvaḥ candrottamatathāgatasya parinirvāṇād yasyāṃ rātrau prathame yāme saddharmāntarhite
S02sjdh_u:21_6_1: tasyāṃ paścime yāme samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāptā padmāyāṃ lokadhātau padmottara nāma tathāgato [Page 16] bhavati /
S02sjdh_u:21_7: tathā kulaputra mama sakāśād iyaṃ drāviḍamantrapadā sarvajñatākāradhāraṇī dhāraya vācaya vistareṇa parebhyaś ca saṃprakāśaya /
S02sjdh_u:21_8: asyāḥ prabhāvena maitreyāśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ maitreyo nāma tathāgato 'rhaṃ samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati /
S02sjdh_u:21_9: tena te maitreyaitarhi mamāntikād yauvarājyaṃ parigṛhītaṃ,
S02sjdh_u:21_10: yathātītānāṃ tathāgatānām antikād atītair bodhisattvair yauvarājyaṃ parigṛhītāḥ /
S02sjdh_u:22_0: tatra khalu bhagavān sarvāvatīṃ parṣadam avalokya tasyāṃ velāyām imāni mantrapadāny abhāṣata /
S02sjdh_u:23_0: dāntabhūmiḥ damathabhūmiḥ smṛtibhūmiḥ prajñābhūmir vaiśāradyabhūmiḥ pratisaṃvidbhūmir anutkṣepabhūmiḥ samatāparikṣayopekṣabhūmir jātikṣayabhūmir muja vinmujaḥ,
S02sjdh_u:23_1: malatmajaḥ, visāgraḥ, daśāvate veśataḥ teraṇa, veśalagra, śamuśavataḥ, vimati vimati yopahira regamata vasisakrama iticoravate,
S02sjdh_u:23_2: makhe mudra daharavate prajñākṣā bubu dahakramitā sadoṣavantaḥ elaya tilaya ahusuṭā amundhamaṃ arthavati,
S02sjdh_u:23_3: muruvati, tehīnadvivā, akanati bakanate samake visābhaṭe,
S02sjdh_u:23_4: iṭe iṭabale [Page 17] atra tatra kuruṣaṃ laruṣaṃ,
S02sjdh_u:23_5: latatha katha sarvanta sarvantavaḥ aniruddhaḥ dihakhatambi,
S02sjdh_u:23_6: phala bahuphala, śataphala, śiṣṭavate, api devānāṃ bhagavāṃ pratītyasamutpādapratisaṃyuktāny adhimuktipadāni prakāśayati,
S02sjdh_u:23_7: eṣu prakāśyamāneṣu ṣaṣṭibhir devanayutaiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam abhūt /
S02sjdh_u:24_0_0: tatphalam agraphalaṃ, lalaha alaha nilaṃhare, vacatakhyā idaṃphalaṃ, niyāmaphalaṃ, namudaya vibhūkha, prajñācakra, sunirvṛticakra,
S02sjdh_u:24_0_1: jñānīcakra, ebhir adhimuktipadair daśānāṃ devakoṭīnāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni tatraivāvaivartikāḥ
S02sjdh_u:25_0: paśya momate, anumate akumato akumati cchīdattake,
S02sjdh_u:25_2: iśasthita, atimati tīkṣṇamati, āloko sterituṣṇa, ebhir adhimuktipadaiś catuḥṣaṣṭīnāṃ nāgasahasrāṇāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni,
S02sjdh_u:26_2: karaṇyākṣa, siddhamati, samantakṣau, alabale, piṭakaro, mahābale, ojadaro dharaṇe migalakṣa, udākṣa, kukākṣa viroyo, virūpamukha, akṣihasta saṃkṣibala asurodina,
S02sjdh_u:26_3: asuropramardane, ebhir adhimuktipadair dvādaśānāṃ yakṣakoṭīnāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni tatraivāvaivartikāḥ saṃvṛtāḥ /
S02sjdh_u:27_0_0: arthe pilile tinithe, saṃtīthe, katitena nakeme, nanamaste, ubherabhe, mudame, madame, matime, saniha śūre, dhāraṇīye sendra
S02sjdh_u:27_0_1: sadeva, sanāga, sayakṣāsuradevā, nāgā nirukti parivāra, niruktarāni, smṛti prajñā parivāramati pratilābhī,
S02sjdh_u:27_5_0: yakṣamudra, rākṣasamudra, vedivedime, tape, tattape uṣṇāname, prakhādya, nanava dhāraṇīya, aviśa diśāśodhane, vākyaśuddhe
S02sjdh_u:27_5_1: jihvāśuddhe, vāciparikarmaḥ prajñā buddhi smṛti mati [Page 19] gati dhṛti gaṇana pratisaraṇabuddhiḥ,
S02sjdh_u:27_6: jayacakre śūnyacakre vyaya, ebhir adhimuktipadair ṣaṭpañcāśānām asurasahasrāṇāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni avaivartikāś ca vyavasthitāḥ /
S02sjdh_u:28_3_0: sattvānāṃ hitāya bodhisattvaguṇaniṣpādanārthaṃ kulaputra tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā dānadamasaṃyamakṣāntivīryasamādhiprajñā
S02sjdh_u:28_4_0: kvacid dānan dattaṃ, śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ, brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇaṃ, kvacid bhāvanā niṣevitā, kṣāntir bhāvitā, vīryam ārabdhaṃ, samādhir
S02sjdh_u:28_4_1: niṣpāditā, prajñā sevitā, bahvaprameyaṃ vividhanānāprakāraiḥ śubhakarma kṛtaṃ,
S02sjdh_u:28_6: anekāṃ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṃ tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāñ caratā,
S02sjdh_u:29_2_0: mukhāc ca jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmayitvā svaṃ mukhaṃ pracchādya tasmāj jihvendriyāt ṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭyo pramuktās taiś cāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātur
S02sjdh_u:29_3: te ca raśmayo ye nairayikāḥ sattvā agninā prajvalitagātrā dahyante teṣāṃ śītalā vāyavo vānti,
S02sjdh_u:29_4: yeṣāṃ spṛṣṭānāṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ sukhā vedanā prādurbabhūva /
S02sjdh_u:29_5: ekaikasya ca nairayikasya purataḥ buddhanirmitaṃ tiṣṭhati dvātriṃśadbhir lakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛta aśītibhiś ca,
S02sjdh_u:29_6: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā te nairayaikāḥ sukhasamarpitā buddhadarśanāpyāyitaśarīrā buddhaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ cintayanto,
S02sjdh_u:30_1: buddhanirmita āha / bhoḥ sattvā evaṃ bhāṣadhvaṃ, namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya,
S02sjdh_u:30_3: tatas te nairayikās sattvā añjaliṃ pragṛhya vācam udīrayanti,
S02sjdh_u:30_4: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya /
S02sjdh_u:30_5: atha te sattvās tena cittaprasādakuśalamūlena tataś cyavitvā ekatyā deveṣūpapannā ekatyā manuṣyeṣu,
S02sjdh_u:30_6: tathaiva pūrvavad yāvat / ye śītanārakāṃ sattvāḥ pretāḥ piśācā vā sukhasamarpitā devamanuṣyeṣūpapannā evaṃ devamanuṣyatiryakṣu lokeṣu raśmayas saṃcodanti /
S02sjdh_u:31_0: gaṇanātikrāntā devamanuṣyā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya niṣaṇṇā karuṇāpuṇḍarīka nāma mahāyānasūtradharmaśravaṇāya /
S02sjdh_u:31_1: tena ca samayena gaṇanātikrāntā devamanuṣyakāyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayām āsuḥ /
S02sjdh_u:32_0: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan /
